text:
Platform Dual Xeon 64bit
httpd_prefork
Suse 10.0

The installation initially worked fine, now the error:
 [crit] [client 127.0.0.1] (13)Permission denied: /raid/srv/www/htdocs/.htaccess
pcfg_openfile: unable to check htaccess file, ensure it is readable

I have checked the permissions and they are all ok. Running as wwwrun, the user
httpd-prefork runs as:
wwwrun@xeon:/raid/srv/www> ps -Af | grep http
root      8469     1  0 09:50 ?        00:00:00 /usr/sbin/httpd2-prefork -f
/etc/apache2/httpd.conf
wwwrun    8470  8469  0 09:50 ?        00:00:00 /usr/sbin/httpd2-prefork -f
/etc/apache2/httpd.conf
wwwrun    8471  8469  0 09:50 ?        00:00:00 /usr/sbin/httpd2-prefork -f
/etc/apache2/httpd.conf
wwwrun    8472  8469  0 09:50 ?        00:00:00 /usr/sbin/httpd2-prefork -f
/etc/apache2/httpd.conf
wwwrun    8473  8469  0 09:50 ?        00:00:00 /usr/sbin/httpd2-prefork -f
/etc/apache2/httpd.conf
wwwrun    8474  8469  0 09:50 ?        00:00:00 /usr/sbin/httpd2-prefork -f
/etc/apache2/httpd.conf
wwwrun    8477  8469  0 09:50 ?        00:00:00 /usr/sbin/httpd2-prefork -f
/etc/apache2/httpd.conf
wwwrun    9422  9256  0 16:46 pts/5    00:00:00 grep http

wwwrun@xeon:/raid/srv/www> ls -la htdocs
total 20
drwxr-xr-x  2 wwwrun www    112 2005-11-05 15:39 .
drwxr-xr-x  9 root   root   232 2005-11-05 15:35 ..
-rwxr-xr-x  1 wwwrun www  15356 2005-11-05 15:38 .htaccess
-rw-r--r--  1 wwwrun www     42 2005-11-05 15:38 index.html

wwwrun@xeon:/raid/srv/www> head htdocs/.htaccess
# $Id: .htaccess,v 1.4 2004/06/29 08:46:46 chestnut Exp $

text:
This is a FAQ.  Fix your permissions on the directories above the file in  
question so Apache can read them.  And if you're using SELinux, check redhat's 
documentation on how that affects apache. 
  
Please use a user support forum for future configuration questions.
creator: nick@webthing.com
